name: 楊韻華
objective:
進階職場專業英文針對本校碩博士生設計系列最後一哩之實務專業課程。課程內容以英語全球溝通為主軸，強化商業寫作、簡報、會議及談判等技巧及能力。
The course provides essential and pragmatic English language used in real workplace. As it is designed for postgraduate students, the course also takes into account students’ academic studies as well as centers on students’ future career prospects. Students are expected to practice and refine their English communication skills, in particular correspondence writing and speaking. In that vein, students will be required to compose business correspondence, such as letters, emails and memos, and also to perform in simulated meetings and to brief progress report in English.
schedule:
Week 1 Orientation
Week 2 Workplace Communication Basics
Week 3 Essential Workplace Language
Week 4-5 Business Correspondence
Week 6-7 Business Presentation
Week 8 Meetings and Briefings
Week 9 Midterm (TOEIC)
Week 11 Meetings and Negotiations
Week 12 Negotiations
Week 13-15 Business Case Studies
Week 16 Social Talks
Week 17 Business Updates
Week 18 Final Exam (TOEIC)
scorePolicy:
Attendance 30%
Presentations and Class Participation 40%
Midterm & Final 30%
materials:
Compiled Handouts 
Intelligent Business Skill Book (Advanced) Longman Pearson, 2011
